protein.specific_function: Occurs in almost all aerobically respiring organisms and serves to protect cells from the toxic effects of hydrogen peroxide. Promotes growth of cells including T-cells, B-cells, myeloid leukemia cells, melanoma cells, mastocytoma cells and normal and transformed fibroblast cells.

go_class.description: cellular response to growth factor stimulus
negative regulation of NF-kappaB transcription factor activity
positive regulation of NF-kappaB transcription factor activity
